channel.title: Comments on: Looking back at BLUG

item.title: By: Theo Heselmans
item.dc:creator: Theo Heselmans
item.description: <p>Matt. Thanks for the kind words. We loved your company too, and had nothing but good feedback about your session.<br/>Looking forward to seeing you soon.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Matt. Thanks for the kind words. We loved your company too, and had nothing but good feedback about your session.
Looking forward to seeing you soon.
